title: Little Flower = Xiao Hua [NTSC]
subject_group: Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/People's Liberation Army (China)
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Foreign language films

Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Communism - China
description: Set in 1930, this melodrama focuses on the fate of two sisters who are separated as babies and grow up in different families unaware of each other's existence. They are reunited by chance as young adults after they join the People's Liberation Army where they also discover their long lost brother. Cast includes Joan Chen, Liu Xiaoquing, Cheng Chong and Guoqiang Tang. In Mandarin with English subtitles.
